scripts.api:test:grep: cd api && npx cypress run --env grepTags=
scripts.api:test:login: cd api && npx cypress run --env grepTags=@login-admin
scripts.api:test:usuarios: cd api && npx cypress run --env grepTags=@criar-usuario
scripts.api:test:ci: cd api && npx cypress run --browser electron --headless
scripts.api:generate-report: cd api && npx mochawesome-merge cypress/reports/mochawesome-*.json > cypress/reports/merged.json && npx mochawesome-report-generator -f index -o cypress/reports cypress/reports/merged.json
scripts.api:run-all: npm run api:test:mochawesome && npm run api:generate-report
